page.title: 13ROADS AROUND HERRINGTHORPE
page.content: Around the area of east Rotherham the land is mainly residential.The roads around the area are very busy too.In Whiston and Wickersley there are new estates being built making the villages bigger. The three main roads in the area are Herringthorpe Vallley Road which is the A6123, Wickersley Road which is the A6021,and East Bawtry Road which is the A631. Herringthorpe Valley Road is probably the most busy of them all. They are having alot of trouble with the crossing because there are two schools on the road.Recently they have put islands in the middle,so crossing is easier.The road runs from Worrygoose island up to the Stag and then down to Eastwood.On Herringthorpe Valley road there are two petrol stations,one with a car on top.
